item.title: How to fix “SyntaxError: Cannot use import statement outside a module”?
item.description: In your development journey, encountering errors is a norm, but some can leave you scratching your head. One such instance is when you’re met with “Cannot use import statement outside a module” in JavaScript. This error can be a hurdle, but with the right guidance, you can overcome it easily. In this article, we’ll explore the why and how of fixing this common issue, equipping you with the tools to continue coding without interruptions.
